outputs.output_descr: The Government services reform project is intended to address the issues related to government services provided by Ministries to citizens and businesses and implement appropriate solutions to optimize those services, minimize the cost &paper work

Memorandum of understanding with General est. of telecom to address the government services provided to citizens& businesses & implement appropriate solutions to optimize those services, minimize cost, paper work & improve Human resources

Memorandum of understanding with Ministry of communication to address the government services provided by Ministry to citizens& businesses & implement appropriate solutions to optimize those services, minimize cost, paper work & improve Human resources

Memorandum of understanding with Ministry of transport to address the government services provided by Ministry to citizens& businesses & implement appropriate solutions to optimize those services, minimize cost, paper work & improve Human resources

Memorandum of understanding with Post office to address the government services provided by the office to citizens& businesses & implement appropriate solutions to optimize those services, minimize cost, paper work & improve Human resources

Memorandum of understanding with National agency for networking services to address government services provided by to citizens& businesses & implement appropriate solutions to optimize those services, minimize cost, paper work & improve Human resources

Memorandum of understanding with Ministry of Health to address the government services provided by Ministry to citizens& businesses & implement appropriate solutions to optimize those services, minimize cost, paper work & improve Human resources

Memorandum of understanding with Ministry of Interior to address the government services provided by Ministry to citizens& businesses & implement appropriate solutions to optimize those services, minimize cost, paper work & improve Human resources
